allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Initial implementation: Ingest + Retrieval \(Step 1\)

- Add document ingestion pipeline with chunking and embedding
- Add FAISS-based vector retrieval
- Add Pydantic models for documents, chunks, and metadata
- Add CLI entry point \(ingest, search, info commands\)
- Add sample documents \(public, internal, confidential\)
- Add comprehensive test suite \(52 tests\)
- Add project configuration \(pyproject.toml, Makefile\)

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
docs: Add mandatory development workflow rules to CLAUDE.md

Add comprehensive development workflow rules including:
- Allowed/disallowed commands for security
- Branching rules requiring feature branches \(never work on main\)
- Branch naming conventions \(feature/, fix/, docs/, spec/\)
- Restrictions by branch type
- Planning rules requiring plans to be persisted in .claude/plans/
- Testing rules requiring all tests to pass before completion

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
